title: Does ‘Brace Position’ Kill Passengers Quickly in an Air Crash?
subtitle: Bracing maximizes the chance of uninjured survival in an air crash; it doesn't ensure that passengers die quickly.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: The purpose of the 'crash' or 'brace' position in airliners is to kill passengers quickly in the event of an crash, or to preserve their remains so as to make identification of bodies easier.
